text_block_list.text:
When I arrived full of enthusiasm at work in
the morning, I was greeted by Hayakawa
Tazuna, the secretary to the president.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Good morning, trainer. Your days with your
horse girl are finally starting!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Working together towards strengthening body
and mind, cultivating your bond… I hope you
enjoy many fruitful days!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
If you perform well in a variety of races,
you may eventually reach the pinnacle of
racing; a G1 title!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm looking forward to it. ♪

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
—To be frank, the first three years of the
Twinkle Series are very important.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
If you fail to achieve a certain
level of performance within  three
years of her debut—

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
This may result in the termination
of your Uma Musume contract.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
That's why these three years are
crucial! Please cooperate and get
through this together.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
First up, you should start training
for the upcoming "Make Debut".

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Well then, have a good day!
